author: Justin Rald

In the end, all we can do is to support them and block any negative messages coming to them. JP people is prone to mental and psychological attack.

author: ぴっぴどん
text:
@Fairenard  
The lost of an archive of Pokemon is due to a super chat, as you said. The content of the Super Chat was like saying that the fans of Rushia had some problems with each other and did not come to the Rushia's live for about a week. Rushia is afraid of these two things: fighting between fans and quitting Rushia's fans. Please do not do anything like this. I would appreciate it if you could tell it to other overseas Niki. If you have any questions, please ask me.

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
From Necromancer into Nekomancer... :_ちょうちょ:

As announced at her 3D birthday party delivery, this is a gift for us... Or a preliminar... The best is inside of today's delivery :_ハート: :_サイリウム碧: :_サイリウム紫:

Rushia-daitenshi's model (Made by Tou Ilie and based on Yasuyuki-sensei's original concept) updated already at Live2D 3.0 at same green haired form... But also is... Hiyoko's Live2D debut.

Her normal appearance also can switch into Nekomimi mode. 

But the best... Rushia's new hairstyle and Nekomimi mode and using her New Live2D's princess outfit... But she didn't show more, because... By example, when she had the Pink-purple hair, Butterflies ornaments were pink... If ornaments went green, it would remembering something...

Can you remember about Rushia's T-shirts promotion? By example, white T-shirt has green haired form (odangos) and the same New Live2D's princess dress; the black T-shirt has the Pink-purple haired form. :_ちょうちょ:

The following point was the review of her 3D Birthday stream, starting with the games and guests and finishing with her own original song titled "Iris". :_るんるん:

And Supaachaato Orei Time... Well... Worrying about some trolls and antis... But anyway, also I'm wondering if she could read Supaachaatos from Minecraft Birthday's countdown and the 3D event.

But finally... She became too closer... Definitively she's the girlfriend who everyone single wants to meet... :_ハート: :_るんるん:

Postscript:
The nekomimis moves when she blinks, but in the opposite direction. (Instead of being down, they raises up) 

Once more, Arigatou, Rushia, Tou Ilie and Yasuyuki-sensei. :_ハート::_きゅん:
